name: Icssimulator
tagline: DNP3 TCP&Serial/Master&Slave, MODBUS TCP&Serial/Master&Slave, OPC Client&Server Free Simulator
body:
# ICSSimulator
DNP3 TCP&Serial/Master&Slave, MODBUS TCP&Serial/Master&Slave, OPC Client&Server Free Simulator.

http://www.icsprotocols.com

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_fV2zHiTuA31Au75df4wBA

Combine both zip files with 7-Zip (http://www.7-zip.org)

You will need .NET Framework 4 to run the Simulator.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
